metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Named Pipe Created Via Mkfifo
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a new named pipe using the "mkfifo" utility in a potentially suspicious location

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/mkfifo')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /tmp/')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a new named pipe using the "mkfifo" utility in a potentially suspicious location
